name: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and bacon.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine with cooked bacon and spaghetti.

name: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful curry made with chicken, spices, and coconut milk.
instructions: Cook chicken with onions. Add curry powder and coconut milk. Simmer.
